import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' function EditDraft(){ const { id } = useParams(); const [draft , setDraft] = useState({ title: '', category: '', hostedBy: '', featuring: '', dressCode: '', date: '', time: '', price: '', description: '', location: '', tickets: '', }) useEffect(()=> { fetch(`/drafts/${id}`) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setDraft(data)) }, [id]) const [title, setTitle] = useState(draft.title) const [category, setCategory] = useState(draft.category); const [hostedBy, setHostedBy] = useState(draft.hostedBy); const [featuring, setFeaturing] = useState(draft.featuring); const [dressCode, setDressCode] = useState(draft.dressCode); const [description, setDescription] = useState(draft.description) const [location, setLocation] = useState(draft.location) const [date, setDate] = useState("") const [time, setTime] = useState("") const [tickets, setTickets] = useState(drafts.ticket) const [price, setPrice] = useState("") // const [image, setImage] = useState("") useEffect(() => { setTitle(draft.title); }, [draft]); console.log(draft); return( <>
